channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Despite weather concerns, New Orleans celebrates Mardi Gras Day and bids farewell to Carnival season
item.description: Thousands of revelers in outlandish costumes filled the streets of New Orleans as the city celebrated Mardi Gras Day despite the threat of storms.

item.title: West Texans, Mennonites at center of measles outbreak choose medical freedom over vaccine mandates
Fargo has an election method that helps mainstream candidates. North Dakota lawmakers may ban it
